description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Enjoy a block building fest with your friends. Make awesome structures in no time with the game's easy to use creation tools. Fight off hordes of zombies with your trusty sword.  Race your friends using the RC cars. You can do anything, as long as it's blocky! (Update2: Create animated objects, make your own pets and doors. Tools to quickly build geometric shapes)
description.short: Enjoy a block building fest with your friends. Make awesome structures in no time with the game's easy to use creation tools. Fight off hordes of zombies with your trusty sword.
